summary: Danny Thomas  was an American comedian, actor and producer.
full_text: Danny Thomas  was an American nightclub comedian and television and film actor and producer, whose career spanned five decades. Thomas was best known for starring in the television sitcom Make Room for Daddy . He was also the founder of St. Jude Children's Research Hospital. He was the father of Marlo Thomas, Terre Thomas, and Tony Thomas.
title: Danny Thomas
